title: ReconnaissPro – Network Vulnerability Scanner
shortDescription: Python-based automated vulnerability scanner with CVE mapping and severity assessment.
fullDescription: Designed and developed a comprehensive Python-based automated vulnerability scanner that performs port scanning, service enumeration, and vulnerability identification. The tool maps findings to CVEs with severity assessment using CVSS scoring and generates structured reports with actionable remediation guidance.
features: Automated port scanning and service detection
Structured report generation with remediation steps
Support for multiple target types (single host, network ranges)
achievements: Awarded Best Project at college technical expo
Successfully identified critical vulnerabilities in test environments
impact: Demonstrated proficiency in automated security assessment and vulnerability management, providing practical value for penetration testing workflows.

title: Network & NFS Service Penetration Testing
shortDescription: End-to-end penetration testing covering reconnaissance, exploitation, and post-exploitation.
fullDescription: Performed comprehensive penetration testing of network services and NFS configurations, covering the full attack lifecycle from reconnaissance through post-exploitation. Identified critical service misconfigurations and privilege escalation risks in controlled environments.
features: Complete reconnaissance phase using multiple tools
impact: Validated attack paths and documented business impact, delivered remediation recommendations aligned with secure configuration best practices.

title: FTP Service & Unauthorized Access Security Assessment
shortDescription: Security assessment of FTP and file-sharing services for unauthorized access risks.
fullDescription: Conducted thorough security assessment of FTP and file-sharing services to identify unauthorized access risks and insecure configurations. Assessed critical access control weaknesses and insecure file permissions in controlled lab environments.
impact: Recommended hardening strategies, monitoring procedures, and patching protocols to secure file-sharing services against unauthorized access.

title: Web Application & Privilege Escalation Testing
shortDescription: Web application penetration testing focusing on directory traversal, file inclusion, and privilege escalation.
fullDescription: Conducted comprehensive web application penetration testing covering directory traversal flaws, file inclusion vulnerabilities, and local privilege escalation scenarios. Achieved controlled remote code execution and demonstrated system-level impact through privilege escalation testing.
features: Directory traversal and path manipulation testing
Local and remote file inclusion exploitation
Local privilege escalation testing and validation
impact: Provided detailed remediation guidance on secure coding practices, input validation, and patch management to development teams.

title: Keylogger & Payload Generator
shortDescription: Controlled forensic and payload simulation tools for Windows and Android platforms.
fullDescription: Developed controlled forensic and payload simulation tools for both Windows and Android platforms in isolated lab environments. Used for behavioral analysis, attack simulation, and defensive detection testing to enhance security team capabilities.
features: Attack simulation for blue team training
impact: Enhanced understanding of attack vectors and detection mechanisms, providing valuable experience in both offensive and defensive security operations.

title: Agro's Corner – Online Marketplace
shortDescription: PHP-based online marketplace connecting farmers directly with buyers.
fullDescription: Developed a secure PHP-based online marketplace platform designed to connect farmers directly with buyers, eliminating intermediaries. Implemented comprehensive backend logic, authentication flows, and user role management with focus on secure data handling and optimized user experience.
features: User authentication and role-based access control
Secure data handling and input validation
impact: Demonstrated full-stack development skills with security-first approach, creating a reliable platform for agricultural commerce.

title: Practical Security Labs
shortDescription: Hands-on experience through TryHackMe, VulnHub CTFs, and OWASP practice environments.
fullDescription: Extensive practical exposure through various security learning platforms including TryHackMe labs, VulnHub CTF challenges, PortSwigger Web Security Academy, and OWASP Juice Shop.
